      • onLogInButton

        public void onLogInButton(java.lang.String username,
                          java.lang.String password)
                   throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        Send to the server the Information the client inserted in the fields to log in. This method will expect an Answer from the server telling him if the information provided are valid. If they are valid will proceed to log the client in and will ask it's listener to change pages to the main page. If the information are not valid, an error message will be displayed on the page.
        Specified by:
        onLogInButton in interface LogInViewController.LogInViewListener
        Parameters:
        username - string
        password - string
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException

      • onRegisterLink

        public void onRegisterLink()
        Ask to the VisitorController class to display the register interface.
        Specified by:
        onRegisterLink in interface LogInViewController.LogInViewListener
